solution_line_template: Lance throws this many pebbles into the lake {candy_pebbles} x {lance_multiplier} = <<{candy_pebbles}*{lance_multiplier}={lance_pebbles}>>{lance_pebbles}.
He throws this many more pebbles than Candy {lance_pebbles} - {candy_pebbles} = <<{lance_pebbles}-{candy_pebbles}={pebbles_more}>>{pebbles_more} pebbles.
